events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund-related issue due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Alice Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Here is my order number 458923 and I have attached a clear photo showing the incorrect product that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide a return shipping label.
I appreciate your prompt response and the solution you proposed. Looking forward to the refund being processed quickly.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and the customer has been notified about the transaction and return instructions.
We are following up to ensure you have received the refund and to confirm that you are satisfied with our resolution. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
The case has been formally closed after confirmation that the refund was processed and the customer is satisfied with the service provided.
